text: José Montserrate Feliciano García (born September 10, 1945), better known simply as José Feliciano, is a Puerto Rican virtuoso guitarist, singer and composer. He is known for many international hits, including his remake of The Doors' "Light My Fire" and the best-selling Christmas single "Feliz Navidad". ==References== ==Other websites== * Jose Feliciano official website * José Feliciano singing "Che Sarà" in Italian at the San Remo Festival in 1971 Category:Emmy Award winners Category:1945 births Category:Living people Category:Puerto Rican singer-songwriters Category:Blind people Category:Grammy Award winners Category:Latin Grammy Award winners Category:Puerto Rican musicians Category:Puerto Rican composers
title: José Feliciano
